IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: THE MISSION OF SEARS IS TO PROVIDE LEADERSHIP IN RESPONSE TO THE NEEDS OF OUR AGING POPULATION. WE BELIEVE WE HAVE A RESPONSIBILITY FOR STUDYING, ANALYZING, PLANNING, DEVELOPING, AND IMPLEMENTING QUALITY SERVICE TO THE AGING WHERE APPROPRIATE NEEDS ARE FOUND FOR HEALTH CARE AND RESIDENTIAL LIVING SERVICES AND CAN BE PROVIDED IN A CHRISTIAN ENVIRONMENT.
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE MISSION OF SEARS IS TO PROVIDE LEADERSHIP IN RESPONSE TO THE NEEDS OF OUR AGING POPULATION. WE BELIEVE WE HAVE A RESPONSIBILITY FOR STUDYING, ANALYZING, PLANNING, DEVELOPING, AND IMPLEMENTING QUALITY SERVICE TO THE AGING WHERE APPROPRIATE NEEDS ARE FOUND FOR HEALTH CARE AND RESIDENTIAL LIVING SERVICES AND CAN BE PROVIDED IN A CHRISTIAN ENVIRONMENT.
IRS990.Description: SEARS BRAZOS RETIREMENT CORPORATION, A NON-PROFIT 501(C)(3) CORPORATION, OWNS AND OPERATES WESLEY WOODS ALZHEIMER'S CARE CENTER IN WACO, TEXAS. WESLEY WOODS IS A 120 BED NURSING FACILITY. THE FACILITY PROVIDES NURSING HOME AND DEMENTIA CARE OPERATIONS. THE FACILITY ALSO PROVIDES LONG-TERM NURSING CARE TO THE ELDERLY AS WELL AS MEDICARE PART B CARE FOR REHABILITATION.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Identifier: DESCRIPTION OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS UNDER FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE SYSTEM ADOPTED THE INCOME TAX STANDARD FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. THIS STANDARD CLARIFIES THE ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES RECOGNIZED IN AN ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE INCOME TAX STANDARD. THIS STANDARD PRESCRIBES RECOGNITION AND MEASUREMENT OF TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN ON A TAX RETURN THAT ARE NOT CERTAIN TO BE REALIZED.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION DELEGATES MANAGEMENT DUTIES INCLUDING SUPERVISING PERSONNEL, OPERATIONS, AND BUDGETING TO SEARS METHODIST RETIREMENT SYSTEM, INC., THE PARENT COMPANY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR SEARS METHODIST RETIREMENTS SYSTEMS, INC. HAS A GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE WHO IS RESPONSIBLE FOR NOMINATING NEW BOARD MEMBERS. THE NOMINATED BOARD MEMBERS ARE THEN VOTED ON BY THE FULL BOARD OR DIRECTORS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A COPY OF THE FORM 990 WAS EMAILED TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS FOR REVIEW AND APPROVAL BEFORE FILING THE RETURN.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENTS ARE COMPLETED ANNUALLY BY SEARS METHODIST RETIREMENT SYSTEM BOARD OF TRUSTEES, SEARS TYLER METHODIST RETIREMENT SYSTEM BOARD OF DIRECTORS, AND ALL SENIOR STAFF. ANY NEW BOARD MEMBERS OR SENIOR STAFF ARE REQUIRED TO COMPLETE THE STATEMENT UPON HIRE.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE COMPENSATION FOR THE CEO IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD IN AN ANNUAL REVIEW. ANY RAISE OR BONUS IS DISCUSSED AND VOTED ON BY THE BOARD. EVERY FEW YEARS AN OUTSIDE COMPENSATION SPECIALIST IS HIRED TO HELP DETERMINE COMPENSATION FOR THE CEO. EACH SENIOR VP OR EXECUTIVE VP REVIEW OR SALARY INCREASE IS DETERMINED BY THE CEO IN AN ANNUAL REVIEW PROCESS, EACH SENIOR VP HAS KEY OFFICERS UNDER THEM THAT ARE REVIEWED IN THE SAME MANNER.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALTHOUGH NOT REQUIRED, PHOTO COPIES OF THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE PROVIDED TO ALL WHO REQUEST ONE OR MORE OF THESE DOCUMENTS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: CHANGES IN NET ASSETS OR FUND BALANCES:
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: INTERCOMPANY FUND TRANSFERS -7,740. DEBT SERVICE PAYMENTS -1,032,423. CHANGE IN SMF INVESTMENT -6,858. TOTAL TO FORM 990, PART XI, LINE 5: -1,047,021.
FORM 990, PART XII, LINE 2C: THIS PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: MANAGES CHARITABLE FUNDS FOR ALL SMRS'S RELATED ENTITIES
